chipmunk.unlimited.feedback

Class LaunchPrompt

  • java.lang.Object
    • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.LaunchPrompt

  • public class LaunchPrompt
extends java.lang.Object
    Class tracking the number of times the application has been launched. After a certain number of times, a dialog prompting the user to rate the application will be displayed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SHPREF_KEY_LAUNCH_COUNT 
      static java.lang.String SHPREF_KEY_NEVER_RATE

      • LaunchPrompt

    • Method Detail

      • onActivityCreate

        public void onActivityCreate()
        Call when the application has started. As "onCreate()" is called on Activities when the application launches AND when the activity is returned to from another activity, call "onActivityPause()" when the application is NOT terminating.

      • onActivityPause

        public void onActivityPause()
        Decrement non-terminating "onPause()" calls from the launch counter.

      • getSharedPreferences

        public SharedPreferences getSharedPreferences()
